mapper.select: select storecode, name,latitude,longitude,address,brand,distance from ( select storecode, name,latitude,longitude,address,brand,CALC_DISTANCE( #{lat},#{lon},LATITUDE,LONGITUDE) as distance from cvstore order by distance ) where rownum <= #{cvStoreCnt}

select p.name, p.imgurl, p.price, cvs.storecode, cvs.brand, cvs.name as storeName from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvs.storecode = #{storecode}
